i1.name: Iron_Ambassador
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Poppy''' {{tip|projectile|throws}} her buckler as her next [[basic attack]], which has {{sti|350 '''bonus''' range}} and deals {{pp|20 to 180|color=magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. The buckler then falls near the target after 1 second, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.

Upon retrieving the buckler, '''Poppy''' {{tip|shield|shields}} herself for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|key=%|13 to 18 for 3|1 to 13}} of her '''maximum''' health}}}} for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to '''Poppy''' automatically. Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} can step on the buckler to destroy it.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Poppy throws her buckler as her next basic attack, which has 350 bonus range and deals 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near the target after 1 second, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.
Upon retrieving the buckler, Poppy shields herself for 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.

q1.name: Hammer_Shock
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the area in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit. Against {{tip|monsters}}, the damage based on their {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is capped.
The impact creates a field for 1 second that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same {{as|physical damage}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.
The impact creates a field for 1 second that slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.

w1.name: Steadfast_Presence
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Poppy''' increases her {{sti|armor|{{as|'''total''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''total''' magic resistance}}}} by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is {{as|below 40% '''maximum''' health}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and creates an [[aura]] around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to {{tip|dash}} into or within it to be dealt {{as|magic damage}},{{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted, {{tip|grounded}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 25% for 2 seconds.
''Steadfast Presence'' can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Poppy increases her total armor and total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
Active: Poppy gains 40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage,knocked up for 0.5 seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted, grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
w1.notes:
* ''Steadfast Presence'' does not stop {{tip|dash|dashes}} if the unit is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}}, {{tip|displacement immune}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, or protected by {{tip|spell shield}} in the process (e.g. {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}, {{ai|Stormbringer|Volibear}}, {{ai|Unstoppable Force|Malphite}}).
** Dashes when the unit is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or {{tip|displacement immune}} still trigger the aura and take the damage, but do not get {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} and thus also never become {{tip|ground|grounded}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
** {{tip|spell shield|Spell shields}} deny all the effects if ''Steadfast Presence'' is triggered by their holder, and are consumed in the process.
** Being {{tip|untargetable}} prevents ''Steadfast Presence'' from triggering, but this does not prevent it from triggering against another, targetable dash.
* ''Steadfast Presence'' does not trigger against {{tip|lunge|lunges}}.

e1.name: Heroic_Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|carries}} them along with her for up to 400 units.
If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same {{as|physical damage}} again and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for a duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and stuns them for a duration.
leveling: {{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Poppy''' will be ordered to basic attack the target.
* ''Heroic Charge'' can apply [[Ability effects|spell effects]] twice (once when '''Poppy''' hits her target and once she stuns them against a wall). ** Both instances of damage and crowd control are all the same {{tip|cast instance}}. Effects that only trigger once per spell cast will not trigger twice.
* '''Poppy''' dashes slightly less far than the distance she pushes the target.
* ''Heroic Charge'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* The {{tip|dash}} does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of ''Heroic Charge's'' cast is the direction '''Poppy''' will dash towards.
** '''Poppy''' does not {{tip|airborne|carry}} nor deal damage to the target if they have left a certain radius before she collides with them.

r1.name: Keeper's_Verdict
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|channels|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{sti|range}} and {{tip|airborne|knockback}} distance over {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the channel. ''Keeper's Verdict'' can be recast at any time within the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Poppy''' releases the charge with a {{fd|0.25}} seconds cast time, launching her hammer upwards to deal {{as|physical damage}} to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second.

If ''Keeper's Verdict'' charged for at least {{fd|0.5}} seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} targets {{tt|up-to 3400 units|Scales up to this value over the first 1 second of the channel}} toward the enemy team's [[Spawn|fountain]]. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, '''Poppy''' instead sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the empowered effects.
If the charge is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} or completes without reactivation, ''Keeper's Verdict'' is cancelled and the ability is put on a {{sti|cd|15-second}} cooldown.
Enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} are {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} and are rendered {{tip|untargetable}} while being displaced if ''Keeper's Verdict'' charged for more than {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's range and knockback distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within the duration.
Recast: Poppy releases the charge with a 0.25 seconds cast time, launching her hammer upwards to deal physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her, knocking them up for 1 second.
If Keeper's Verdict charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and knocks back targets up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's Spawn. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, Poppy instead sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the empowered effects.
If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a 15-second cooldown.
Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
r1.notes:
* During the Recast's cast time, '''Poppy's''' {{si|Flash}} is {{tip|lockout|sealed}}.
* The erupting hammer of the charged cast that sends out a missile will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.
* Enemies within the enemy team's fountain (at least 400 units away from the {{tt|center of the fountain|the respawning point}}) that are hit by a ''Keeper's Verdict'' that would knock them back are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds and not rendered {{tip|untargetable}}, like the uncharged effect. They still receive the full damage.
* ''Keeper's Verdict'' does not destroy in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} for enemies hit if they are rendered {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock back}} will only displace enemies as far as they can go (e.g. to the furthest current spot available of {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} and {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} borders and to the corner of the fountain).
** The displacement's duration will remain unchanged regardless of if the knock back cannot achieve its full distance due to the affected target being restricted by boundaries they are unable to cross. In order for this to be possible, the speed of the knock back is decreased (based on where the actual landing point is) to match the amount of distance covered to time spent displaced.
* ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{tip|airborne}} debuff cannot be removed by {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effects.
** The debuff will be removed the moment the forced movement ends.
